title: Approval and accreditation of vocational training courses (Scotland)

details.description: Approval from the Scottish Qualifications Authority for centres of learning including colleges, employers and private training providers
details.licence_overview:
Centres of learning including colleges, employers and private training providers who provide vocational training in Scotland need approval from the Scottish Qualifications Authority (SQA).

This includes the provision of training leading to external qualifications including, but not limited to, Scottish Vocational Qualifications.

All new external qualifications offered in Scotland must be accredited by the SQA.
